title: Create Reusable React Spinner
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a spinning loader component using React and CSS. The purpose of this component is to provide a visual indication to the user that the application is loading or processing data. By the end of this lab, you will have a reusable loader component that you can use in your React projects.

meta.title: Create a Spinning Loader with React | CSS Animation Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to create a reusable spinning loader component using React and CSS. Provides a visual indication of loading or processing data in your web application.
meta.keywords: React, CSS Animation, Spinning Loader, Web Development, Tutorial
